modName: Liliths Slayer - Custom Sword and Greatsword
summary:

descriptionHtml:
Got problems, advice or ideas? Make a comment! All feedback is very welcome.

=========================================================================================
3.0 update:
----------------
- Adds an new version of the weapons into the game called Lilith\'s Ancient Slayer that has darker textures, shine and glowing edges. These weapons have slightly higher attack than the normal ones. You will need to upgrade the basic version with of the weapon with 5 daedra hearts to get the ancient version

- Handle of the spears have been made thinner

- Adds a small 1-handed sword that has the same dps as the others (less attack, more atk.spd)

- Vampire dust removed from crafting ingredients

=========================================================================================

Lilith\'s Slayer - Custom Sword
----------------------------------------
=========================================================================================
This weapon is part of a Weapon set \"Lilith\'s Tools\"
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Lilith\'s Disemboweler - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14906]Link[/url]

Lilith\'s Reaver -  [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15969]Link[/url]

Lilith\'s Sickle - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22368]Link[/url]

Lilith\'s Carver - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22930]Link[/url]

Lilith\'s Obliterator - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23733]Link[/url]

Lilith\'s Slayer - This mod

(Lilith\'s Razor - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11908]Link[/url])

(Lilith\'s Cleavers - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12458]Link[/url])

(Lilith\'s Decapitator - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13416]LInk[/url])

=========================================================================================

Description:
- - - - - - - -
Latest version: 1.0
[youtube]6JuzEuc5rm8[/youtube]
[youtube]EqU39Y-syb8[/youtube] 
[youtube]TE_9PO4hXvo[/youtube]
[youtube]_56yZfTT2D8[/youtube]


.....................................................................................................................................
This weapon is part of a Weapon set \"Lilith\'s Tools\"
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
......................................................................................................................................

This mod was originally meant to be a smallish retexture remake of my earlier mod Lilith\'s Reaver but once again it got out of hand. The mod includes 3 one handers and 3 two handers that have different sizes.
The stats are the same on them however (the 2-handers and 1-handers have their own). I tried to put as much detail in it as possible and I think it worked out pretty well.

Stats (2h): base damage 27 (24 on daedric greatsword), spd 0.8, reach 1.4

Stats (1h): base damage 17 (14 on daedric greatsword), spd 1.1, reach 1.2


Crafting requirements(2hs): Daedric smithing, 6 ebony ingots, 6 daedra hearts, 3 vampire dusts, 20 leather stips

Crafting requirements(2hs): Daedric smithing, 4 ebony ingots, 4 daedra hearts, 3 vampire dusts, 15 leather stips

or use the console

1: type \"help lilith\" into the console

2: it gives you the IDs. I guess you did this since you found the IDs

3. type \"player.additem *id* *amount* \" without the * and \"


Installion:
- - - - - -

1. Dump everything inside the data folder into the skyrim\'s data folder. Merge if asked. / or use the mod manager. it should work.

2. check the .esp file and you\'re ready to go

Uninstallion:
- - - - - - - - -

Just remove the files you added.
author: wiikki
